home.welcome: Making Foreigner Life in Korea Easier and Richer
home.description: MyQuokka is a comprehensive support service for foreigners living in or visiting Korea. We help solve problems related to language barriers, cultural differences, and administrative complexities.

about.title: About MyQuokka
about.subtitle: We provide comprehensive support services for foreigners living in Korea. We make life in Korea more convenient and enjoyable by overcoming language barriers.

mission.title: Mission
mission.description: To help foreigners overcome language barriers and cultural differences to lead a more comfortable and enriching life in Korea.

vision.title: Vision
vision.description: To create a world where all foreigners living in Korea can fully realize their potential and enjoy Korean life without language barriers.

inclusivity.title: Inclusivity
inclusivity.description: We welcome and respect all individuals from diverse cultures and backgrounds.

reliability.title: Reliability
reliability.description: We strive to provide accurate and dependable services.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: We continuously seek new solutions and improve our services.

member1.name: Hong Gil-dong
member1.bio: A multilingual expert who founded MyQuokka to help foreigners adapt to life in Korea.

member2.name: Kim Seo-yeon
member2.bio: Fluent in English, Chinese, Japanese, and other languages, leading our high-quality translation services.

member3.name: Lee Jun-ho
member3.bio: Specializes in accurately understanding customer needs and providing optimal solutions.
